description: This document contains a schema describing geotoolkit.attributes.Style

description: Schema describing the geotoolkit Clip Style class

geometry.description: The geometry of the clipping area

description: Schema describing the geotoolkit Colored Style class

color.title: Color

description: Schema describing the geotoolkit Fill Style class

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: The pattern that defines the fill. Or a reference to another pattern.

foreground.title: Foreground Color
foreground.description: The color to fill over the pattern.

evenoddmode.title: EvenOdd Mode
evenoddmode.description: Defines if pattern has to be applied in evenodd mode or nonzero

description: This document contains a schema describing geotoolkit.attributes.GeometryPattern class instance
title: Geotoolkit GeometryPattern Schema

scalable.description: True to scale the pattern together with the shape, false to keep constant pattern size and multiply instead.
scalable.title: Name

absolutecoordinates.description: Defines if the start and end points of the gradiens should be calculated relative to the bounds of the object it fills or the whole scene.
absolutecoordinates.title: Absolute Coordinates

spreadmethod.description: Defines how the gradient behaves when vector defined by start and end does not cover the entire object.
spreadmethod.title: Spread Method

stoppoints.description: An array of color stop points containing positions and colors
stoppoints.title: Stop Points

items.description: An object containing properties of the color stop

position.label: Stop Position
position.description: The position of the color stop in the model limits of the shape that the gradient is filling, which is always [0,1]

color.label: Stop Color
color.description: The color of the color stop.

transformation.description: The transformation of the gradient vector
transformation.title: Transformation

unittype.description: Defines how the points defining the vector are being calculated. UserSpaceOnUse is equivalent to absolute coordinates.
unittype.title: Unit Type

description: This document contains a schema describing geotoolkit.attributes.ImagePattern class instance
title: Geotoolkit ImagePattern Schema

rawsize.description: True to preserve the original size of the image
rawsize.title: Raw Size

description: Schema describing the geotoolkit Line Style class

pixelsnapmode.title: Pixel Snap Mode

x.description: The pixel snapping along x axis

y.description: The pixel snapping along y axis

linejoin.title: Line Join
linejoin.description: The shape formed on the joins of the lines

linecap.title: Line Cap
linecap.description: The shape formed on the edges of the lines

description: This document contains a schema describing geotoolkit.attributes.Pattern class instance
title: Geotoolkit Pattern Schema

containername.description: The name of the container where the to take pattern from

src.description: The source string of the pattern image. Can be a url or a Base64 string.

alt.description: The alternative text to display if pattern image can not be displayed
alt.title: Alt

font.description: The font family of the text

baseline.description: The virtual vertical line along which the character rests

alignment.description: The position of the text in the containing bounds relative to the center.
alignment.title: Alignment

lineheight.description: CSS formatted height of a single line of text

multiline.description: Defines if the text should be split into multiple lines or keep one line regardless of the length.

autosize.description: Auto font size on high definition display.
